lines.i: Information about the environment in which the patient is found

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665-0" EMS scene Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10732)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Scene" (CONF:10734)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11028)
Contains exactly one [1..1] First Unit Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.84)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11032)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Scene Patient Count (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.86)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11034)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mass Casualty Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.87)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11036)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location Type Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665-0" EMS scene Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10732)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Scene" (CONF:10734)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11028)
Contains exactly one [1..1] First Unit Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.84)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11032)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Scene Patient Count (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.86)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11034)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mass Casualty Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.87)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11036)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Location Type Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88)
